workflow.title: Designing and building digital experiences
workflow.description: I create high-performance digital solutions with the best technologies. From the front end to the back end, I develop agile, robust, and adaptable software.
workflow.serviceDesc1: Not every business needs the same thing, which is why I develop customized software that adapts to your needs. From web platforms to integrated systems, I create tools that optimize your business, improve processes, and boost your growth.
workflow.serviceDesc2: Your clients and administrators will be able to access your site from mobile devices, tablets, or computers with complete ease. I develop solutions with responsive technology that adapt to any screen, offering intuitive navigation and optimal performance for everyone.
workflow.serviceDesc3: Information is the heart of your business, and a well-structured database makes all the difference. I implement secure, optimized, and scalable systems with automatic backup and rapid access so you always stay in control.

experience.title: Professional Profile
experience.name: Web Developer
experience.description: I have over three years of experience in scalable web applications for sectors such as telecommunications, banking, and public administration. I specialize in technologies such as Angular, Spring Boot, and .NET Core. I focus on efficient, maintainable, and user-oriented solutions, and I have the ability to work in agile environments, proactively solve problems, and collaborate in multidisciplinary teams.
experience.expDesc1: Managing client websites and providing internal technical support, troubleshooting issues and ensuring the functionality of applications.
experience.expDesc2: I was part of the team that developed forms for legal procedures for the government of the Balearic Islands, streamlining the legal processes.
experience.expDesc3: I handled tickets for changes to the main website, supported technical issues, and developed. Highlights included requests for card blocking on the website and an internal solution.
